snippet: John J. Hoffman, who has been the state’s top law enforcement official since June 2013, will become senior vice president and general counsel for the university.
lead_paragraph: John J. Hoffman, who has been the state’s top law enforcement official since June 2013, will become senior vice president and general counsel for the university.

headline.main: New Jersey’s Acting Attorney General Accepts Job at Rutgers
headline.print_headline: Attorney General Of New Jersey Takes Rutgers Job
